record.title: PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent for Stanford Swinton, Anne Freeman, Lynda Simmons, Bess Ullman, Ann Thomas, and Eric Slack of my staff to be given privileges of the floor during the deliberation of H.R. 2, the Fair Minimum Wage Act of 2007.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
